text:
I'm using a hubsport as CRM and HubSpot form to get user information (like name & email) from clients which works perfectly (javascritp embeded into our webpage).
After submitting I want to send parts of the inserted data (email) to another service provided with an API call.
is `onFormSubmit` the best solution for this?

Wondering if someone can help me...

I have a question about how to implement some custom functionality in the CMS. We have course data coming from an external API which needs integration.

As a CMS editor, I want to select a custom module and give it a course ID, so that the upcoming dates of the course will be displayed automatically on the page for public users.

I have done integration of productFruits and HubSpot in my angular web application. The integration was working fine, but people who were reaching out were named as "anonymous user". So I did some digging in the docs and found <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversation/visitor-identification>. I followed the steps and did the same where we set
```window.hsConversationsSettings = {
  loadImmediately: false
};```
After doing this when I click on the chat box button to load the chat window it's taking delay of around 15-12sec to load which is a bad user experience. Looking for help to resolve this.
Screenshots:
PS: We can only see the close button which is part of my index.html but the chat window is still invisible.
how many tags does your portal have?
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C019VT42R8X/p1681278088866279>

This request will work:
```<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/0-1/nerds@gmail.com?idProperty=email>```
is anyone having issues with HubSpot’s cache not updating? i’ve made changes to my templates and I don’t see anything come through. I’ve bursted my cache, tried in incognito…. nothing.

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!

without you
you complete me
Hey, can anyone tell me if I can import products with HubSpot API import? It's not mentioned in the docs: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/imports>
has anyone had the issue where you can't see the HubSpot video thumbnail on mobile (iPhone), on a CMS Page?
is there any fix for that ?
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1681320325140939>
Hi guys, quick question, where can I find code for a blog post side menu?
Is there any other endpoint I can use which isn't deprecated?
yeah you can use the user provisioning endpoint
from the screenshot
that one isn't deprecated the endpoint that you linked was

Hi guys!
I have a question, I am using custom quote templates but I need each template to be able to edit the columns independently. Could someone help me?

hello everyone. I am doing the integration between HubSpot, zappier and the facebook pixel. I am following all the steps that facebook mentions in its implementation guide but I can't find the "facebook lead ID" field, I only need that field to finish the integration. Where can I include that field or create it? I leave you the facebook guide: <https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/conversions-api/conversion-leads-integration/zapier/step-1-implement-integration> . I hope you can help me. thank you so much.
